Package io.delta.kernel

Delta Kernel interfaces for constructing table object representing a Delta Lake table, getting snapshot from the table and building a scan object to scan a subset of the data in the table.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Scan
    An object representing a scan of a Delta table.
    ScanBuilder
    Builder to construct Scan object.
    Snapshot
    Represents the snapshot of a Delta table.
    Table  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ScanFile
    Helper methods provided by the Delta core to read data from a scan file entry and get metadata about the scan file entry.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidExpressionException
    Thrown when the given Expression is not valid.
    TableNotFoundException
    Thrown when there is no Delta table at the given location.
    TableVersionNotFoundException
    Thrown when a particular version is not found in the Delta table

Package io.delta.kernel Description

Delta Kernel interfaces for constructing table object representing a Delta Lake table, getting snapshot from the table and building a scan object to scan a subset of the data in the table.
